Main content starts here, tab to start navigating
About Us
Our Story
Leesburg Public House is a beloved neighborhood restaurant in Loudoun County, now entering a vibrant new chapter under the leadership of co-owners John Cosgrove and Executive Chef Aldrin Asencio. After a decade of passionate ownership, original founders Mark Marrocco and Kim Ross have passed the torch, leaving behind a strong legacy built on family values, hospitality, and community connection.
Our Team
John Cosgrove
Co-Owner & Hospitality Director
Chef Aldrin Asencio
Chef-Partner
